name: MAULANA ABUL KALAM AZAD EDUCATION TRUST
briefDescription: MAULANA ABUL KALAM AZAD EDUCATIONAL TRUST (MAKAET), ESTABLISHED IN 2001 BY A GROUP OF FRIENDS WHO WANTED TO MAKE SERIOUS SOCIAL CONTRIBUTIONS, IS A REGISTERED CHARITABLE ORGANISATION REGISTERED UNDER THE SOCIETIES REGISTRATION ACT, AND, FOREIGN CONTRIBUTION REGULATION ACT OF GOVERNMENT OF INDIA. IT IS AN  ORGANISATION MANAGED BY EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND RUN BY A TEAM OF EXPERIENCED SOCIAL ACTIVISTS - BOTH WOMEN AND MEN. IT HAS ADEQUATE INFRASTRUCTURAL SUPPORT LIKE 3 RENTED SCHOOLS IN DHARAVI, MUMBAI WITH NECESSARY OFFICE EQUIPMENT AND COMPUTER SUPPORT. IT HAS A FULLY COMPUTERISED ACCOUNTS KEEPING SYSTEM. ITS MAIN OFFICE IS LOCATED AT DHARAVI.
